alert.note: Alert for Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, southeastern Hays, northern Guadalupe, south central Travis and east central Comal Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Canyon Lake Dam to near Uhland. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Austin, New Braunfels, San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Wimberley, Tanglewood Forest, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Canyon Lake, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Onion Creek, Shady Hollow, Manchaca, Mountain City, San Leanna and Hays. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
